TopicTitle: Voyager Labs Aeronautics and Space Administration (ORDERS ON HOLD ATM)

Articles.Content: hi there sbowyer im starting on the KSS station and i thorght you could going in the project with your staff design moduals and that it's ok if you don't want to im still designing the core

well i thought that you and your team could joing my project
I can join if ya want Also im a little behind I accepted your application, Just need to update the list.
not a problem

well darn it lol i tryd to make a big carrier plane and mut the standard pre instaled mk3 ravenspear on top of it but i wont take off it always leans to mutch to the left or right when taking of and then crashes horrebly (alredy 5 dead kerbals) it used those big rocket fuel parts becuas i wanted to make it look a bit like a big plane like the you got the c130 in Rl and tweaked the fuel tanks got 5 aerospike engines one it but still it crashed horebly befor its even possble to take off also note: for other poeple dont use the big ASAS for big planes becuas it just snaps off when it gets a little bit of force pushed on it

What about an !eyecandy! rocket with the kethane mod on board??

I think it should be at least able to get to duna mine some kethane there and maybe, if one decides it should, serve as an orbital refilling station at duna or any other moon/planet.

In case any failure will occur during the mission it maybe also should have a working solar panel config with some batteries and enough thrust to be able to land

Im not very good at describing things, but maybe someone is willing to be creative
What are the mods we can use? any?

What are the mods we can use? any?

Yup you can use any mods you want/need, some are obvious that will be needed (kethane mod, electrical plugin etc). Though i think you know better what you'll need

I have no problem with installing further mods, no restrictions on my side.

Thanks in advance for taking care!
